channel.title: New Computer
channel.description:
I'm planning to buy a new pc with these specs for about 650$:
Fan: Cooler Master Elite 310 Black/Silver Fans: 1x 120mm Bak, ATX, mATX, 2x USB, 1x Audio, 17 dBA
Power supply: Silver Power SP-SS500 500W PSU ATX 12V V2.2, 80 Plus, Standard, 1x 6pin+1x 6+2pin PCIe, 6× SATA, 120mm Fan
Processor: AMD Athlon II X2 250, 3,0Ghz, AM3, 2MB, 65W, Boxed
RAM: Kingston ValueR. DDR3 1333MHz 4GB, CL9, Kit w/two matched ValueRAM 2GB DDR3
Motherboard: MSI GF615M-P33, Socket-AM3, m-ATX, GeForce 6150se, DDR3,SATAII, GbLAN, PCI-Ex16
GFX: XFX Radeon HD 5670 1GB GDDR5 PCI-Express 2.0, DVI-I, native-HDMI, DisplayPort, 775MHz
HDD : Western Digital Caviar SE16 500GB SATA2 16MB 7200RPM
and i have to buy OS too, the collected price is about 970$
Is this a good idea? ^_^

item.title: New Computer
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
It also has this overclocking button, someone overclocked this computer to 3,7 Ghz, not gonna use it, i guess

I don’t play very much on the computer, i’m probably going to play HL, Portal 2 and something else that i get some time. So i am buying this.

EDIT: after watching some reviews, no i’m not, i’m waiting till christmas

Read full topic

item.title: New Computer
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
Not to mention if there is something malignant hidden in there, it’d suck to install it on a brand new comp. I’d avoid any unnecessary :pirate: until the comp is a piece of shit and breaking it just gives you a reason to get another.

Read full topic

item.title: New Computer
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
Medevilae:

:pirate: your OS.

No, it’s a lot more struggling. And i’m trying to cut down on the pirating

item.description:

item.title: New Computer
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Mango Assassin:

hmm, personally, save up more $$$ first, that GPU isn’t exactly killer. besides, therell be more pricedrops this year, wait a little longer, and get something a little newer.

This is actually what I’m planning on doing. I figure post-Christmas is when I’ll be buying.

Read full topic

item.title: New Computer
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
I recommend getting a WD black instead of blue. Cost a little more (~$10) but they are niiiice. Super quiet and good performance.

Read full topic
